name: swag/platform-security
description: Fixes known issues for outdated Shopware installations

description.de-DE: Das im Admin aktivierte Plugin schließt dann aktuelle Sicherheitslücken in Deinem Shopware 6 System. Bitte achte darauf, dieses Plugin stets auf die aktuellste Version upzudaten.
description.en-GB: In order to protect you Shopware 6 system from possible security vulnerabilities, simply download and activate the plugin in your admin. Please be certain to always keep this plugin updated to its latest version.
